suite.name: TestTextInput

kw.name: Set Environment Variable
kw.doc: Sets an environment variable to a specified value.

test.name: Given Site http://uitestingplayground.com/textinput is open

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.
WebDriverException: Message: 'chromedriver' executable needs to be in PATH. Please see https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/home

test.status: WebDriverException: Message: 'chromedriver' executable needs to be in PATH. Please see https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/home

test.name: Given button text is "Button That Should Change it's Name Based on Input Value"

kw.name: Get Text
kw.arg: //button[text('Button That Should Change it's Name Based on Input Value')]
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.

test.name: When I input text "Test" in text field

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.

test.name: And Click on button "Button That Should Change it's Name Based on Input Value"

kw.name: Click Button
kw.arg: //button[text('Button That Should Change it's Name Based on Input Value')]
kw.msg: Clicking button '//button[text('Button That Should Change it's Name Based on Input Value')]'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.

suite.doc: Check that text on button changed after click
